revised_title: On the Periodic Nature of Hemispherical Sunspot Excess and its Connection to Terrestrial Magnetism
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between the difference in sunspot area between the northern and southern hemispheres and the 26-day period of terrestrial magnetism. They find no correlation between the two, suggesting that the variations in the mean terrestrial magnetic force are not directly connected to the distribution of sunspots.
